AT.name: Sonic & All-Stars Racing Transformed
AT.description: Sonic und das All-Stars-Team nehmen wieder ihre Startpositionen ein. Der Kampf um die Vorherrschaft im ultimativen Rennspektakel geht weiter. In transformierenden Fahrzeugen, die sich kurzerhand von Autos in Boote und in Flugzeuge verwandeln, trittst du zu Lande, zu Wasser und in der Luft gegen deine Gegner an. Rennen war gestern, heute ist Transformieren!

AU.name: Sonic & All-Stars Racing Transformed
AU.description: Sonic and the All-Stars cast line up on the starting grid once again to battle for supremacy in the ultimate race. Compete across land, water and air in incredible transforming vehicles that change from cars to boats to planes mid-race. It’s not just racing, it’s racing transformed!

BG.name: Sonic & All-Stars Racing Transformed
BG.description: Sonic and the All-Stars cast line up on the starting grid once again to battle for supremacy in the ultimate race. Compete across land, water and air in incredible transforming vehicles that change from cars to boats to planes mid-race. It’s not just racing, it’s racing transformed!

BE.name: Sonic & All-Stars Racing Transformed
BE.description: Sonic et les All-Stars retournent une fois de plus sur la grille de départ pour participer à la course ultime. Affrontez-vous sur terre, sur mer et dans les airs grâce aux incroyables véhicules transformables en voitures, bateaux ou avions en pleine course. Ce n'est pas une simple course, c'est une course transformée !

ES.name: Sonic & All-Stars Racing Transformed
ES.description: Sonic y los All-Stars vuelven a la parrilla de salida una vez más para luchar por la supremacía en la carrera definitiva. Compite por tierra, agua y aire en impresionantes vehículos que cambian de forma en plena carrera: coches, barcos y aviones. No es una carrera cualquiera, ¡es una carrera de transformación!

IT.name: Sonic & All-Stars Racing Transformed
IT.description: Sonic e il cast di All-Stars sono nuovamente sulla linea di partenza, pronti a lottare per la sopravvivenza. Corri su terra, in acqua e nei cieli con incredibili veicoli trasformabili, in grado di diventare auto, barche o aerei durante la corsa. Non si tratta solo di correre, ma anche di trasformarsi!

LT.name: Sonic & All-Stars Racing Transformed
LT.description: Sonic and the All-Stars cast line up on the starting grid once again to battle for supremacy in the ultimate race. Compete across land, water and air in incredible transforming vehicles that change from cars to boats to planes mid-race. It’s not just racing, it’s racing transformed!

Compete across land, water and air in incredible transforming vehicles that change from cars to boats to planes mid-race. It’s not just racing, it’s racing transformed!

NL.name: Sonic & All-Stars Racing Transformed
NL.description: Sonic en de cast van All-Stars stellen zich nogmaals op voor een gevecht om de heerschappij in de ultieme race. Strijd te land, ter zee en in de lucht met ongelooflijke transformerende voertuigen die tijdens de race veranderen van auto's in boten en vliegtuigen. Dit is geen gewone race, dit is "Racing Transformed"!

NZ.name: Sonic & All-Stars Racing Transformed
NZ.description: Sonic and the All-Stars cast line up on the starting grid once again to battle for supremacy in the ultimate race. Compete across land, water and air in incredible transforming vehicles that change from cars to boats to planes mid-race. It’s not just racing, it’s racing transformed!

PT.name: Sonic & All-Stars Racing Transformed
PT.description: O Sonic e o elenco All-Stars alinham-se na linha de partida mais uma vez para combater pela supremacia na derradeira corrida. Compete em terra, água e ar, em incríveis veículos que se transformam de carros para barcos para aviões em plena corrida. Não é só correr, é transformar a corrida!

RU.name: Sonic & All-Stars Racing Transformed
RU.description: Sonic и команда All-Stars снова замерли на стартовых позициях, чтобы выявить лучшего в этих величайших гонках. Соревнуйтесь на суше, на воде и в воздухе на невероятных болидах, которые прямо по ходу гонки превращаются то в машины, то в лодки, то в самолеты. Да, это не просто гонки, а гонки с трансформациями!

SE.name: Sonic & All-Stars Racing Transformed
SE.description: Sonic and the All-Stars cast line up on the starting grid once again to battle for supremacy in the ultimate race.
